about_the_game:
Aetheria: Whispers of the Forest Moon

About the Game:
Step into Aetheria: Whispers of the Forest Moon, a nostalgic turn-based RPG that brings back the magic of early 90s gaming. Adapted from an original short novella, this game is a tribute to the fantasy literature of the late 70s, reminiscent of Michael Moorcock's Elric series.

Storyline:
In the enchanting world of Aetheria, three fairy warriors are on the cusp of graduating from their academy when their city is suddenly attacked. Embark on epic quests and missions to uncover the source of the darkness threatening their land. Aetheria promises a rich narrative filled with adventure, friendship, and the battle against an ancient evil.

Features:

Classic Turn-Based Combat: Engage in strategic, turn-based battles that capture the essence of classic RPGs.
Epic Quests: Traverse a vibrant world filled with diverse missions, hidden secrets, and lore-rich environments.
Rich Storytelling: Immerse yourself in a narrative inspired by classic fantasy tales, brought to life with engaging dialogue and compelling characters.
Nostalgic Graphics and Sound: Enjoy retro-inspired visuals and a soundtrack that pays homage to the beloved RPGs of the past.
Prepare to embark on an unforgettable journey with Aetheria: Whispers of the Forest Moon. Set to be released within the year, alongside Good Kitsune, offering a double feature of retro gaming adventure.
